snippet.title: Probus Club of Kawana Waters hosts Christmas in July
snippet.content: THE Probus Club of Kawana Waters celebrated Christmas in July in grand style at the Oaks Oasis Resort restaurant in Golden Beach. In bright, newly upgraded and comfortable surroundings, members were treated to a veritable feast of Christmas fare.
